edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories

Interface MemberDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemberDaoImpl

    public interface MemberDao
    DAO interface for Member Entity bean; Provides access methods for accessing members from persistent store
    Author:
    Pramod R. Khare, Swapnil Gupta

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeChildMemberActivationStatusByParentMemberId(Long parentMemberId, MemberStatusType status)
      Change Activation status for all children, sub-children members under given parent member with new status
      void deleteMember(Member member)
      Delete a given member
      boolean doesMemberNameExistForParentMember(String memberName, Long parentMemberId)
      Checks if for a given member are there any of its child members have a given membername
      Set<Member> findActiveMembersByCategoryAndParentMember(Long categoryId, Long parentMemberId)
      Get all members of a given category type and which are under given parent member in its hierarchy tree and which are currently having MemberStatusType as Active
      Set<Member> findAllMembersByCategoryAndParentMember(Long categoryId, Long parentMemberId)
      Get all members of a given category type (given by category-id) and which are under given parent member (given by parent member id) in its member hierarchy tree
      Set<Member> findAllSubmittableMembersByParentMemberId(Long parentMemberId)
      Get all members which are submittable - including all immediate and distant sub-children in its hierarchy; This will also return current parent member in returned list if it is submittable.

      Get all available members in current installation

      Save a new member; This method does not add any default conductor role for a newly created member

      saveMember - overloaded method; Assigns default conductor role for user with given userId for a newly created member

      • getAllMembers

        List<Member> getAllMembers()
        Get all available members in current installation
        Returns:
        List - list of members retrieved

      • getMember

        Member getMember(Long id)
        Get Member by its member id
        Parameters:
        id - - member id to be retrieved from persistent store
        Returns:
        - Member object if there is a member with given member-id else returns null

      • updateMember

        void updateMember(Member modifiedMember)
                  throws Exception
        Update member details
        Parameters:
        modifiedMember - - modified member to be saved
        Throws:
        Exception - - throws exception if it fails to modify related folder in CMS while saving the modified member

      • deleteMember

        void deleteMember(Member member)
        Delete a given member
        Parameters:
        member - - a member to be deleted

      • saveMember

        void saveMember(Member newMember)
        Save a new member; This method does not add any default conductor role for a newly created member
        Parameters:
        newMember - - new member to be saved

      • saveMember

        void saveMember(Member newMember,
              User conductor)
        Save a new member; adds a default conductor role for newly created member for given user
        Parameters:
        newMember - - new member to be saved
        conductor - - a user who will assume a default conductor role for this newly created member

      • saveMember

        void saveMember(Member newMember,
              Long conductorUserId)
        saveMember - overloaded method; Assigns default conductor role for user with given userId for a newly created member
        Parameters:
        newMember - - new member to be saved
        conductorUserId - - id of a user who will assume conductor role for newly created member

      • findAllMembersByCategoryAndParentMember

        Set<Member> findAllMembersByCategoryAndParentMember(Long categoryId,
                                                  Long parentMemberId)
        Get all members of a given category type (given by category-id) and which are under given parent member (given by parent member id) in its member hierarchy tree
        Parameters:
        categoryId - - id of a category who is parent category
        parentMemberId - - id of a parent member in the member hierarchy tree
        Returns:
        - set of members who are of given parent category type and are under given parent member in member hierarchy tree

      • findAllSubmittableMembersByParentMemberId

        Set<Member> findAllSubmittableMembersByParentMemberId(Long parentMemberId)
        Get all members which are submittable - including all immediate and distant sub-children in its hierarchy; This will also return current parent member in returned list if it is submittable.
        Parameters:
        parentMemberId - - id of member from which to start tracing member hierarchy tree to retrieve all submittable members list
        Returns:
        - set of members which are submittable

      • getMemberByIdWithUserMappings

        Member getMemberByIdWithUserMappings(Long id)
        Load Member for a given member id along with its registered users i.e. UserToMemberMapping
        Parameters:
        id - - id of member to retrieve
        Returns:
        - a Member object along with all registrations for this member

      • getMemberByIdWithSubmissions

        Member getMemberByIdWithSubmissions(Long id)
        Load Member for given member id along with its all user submissions
        Parameters:
        id - - id of member to retrieve
        Returns:
        - a Member object along with all document submitted for this member

      • getSubmittersForMemberId

        Set<User> getSubmittersForMemberId(Long id)
        Get users list for given MemberId which have registered for this member in SUBMITTER role
        Parameters:
        id - - id of member for which we are finding list of users who have registered in SUBMITTER role
        Returns:
        - set of users who have registered for this member in SUBMITTER role

      • getEvaluatorsForMemberId

        Set<User> getEvaluatorsForMemberId(Long id)
        Get users List for given MemberId which have registered for this member in Evaluator role
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getConductorsForMemberId

        Set<User> getConductorsForMemberId(Long id)
        Get users List for given MemberId which have registered for this member in Conductor role
        Parameters:
        id - - id of member for which we are finding list of users who have registered in CONDUCTOR role
        Returns:
        - set of users who have registered for this member in CONDUCTOR role

      • doesMemberNameExistForParentMember

        boolean doesMemberNameExistForParentMember(String memberName,
                                         Long parentMemberId)
        Checks if for a given member are there any of its child members have a given membername
        Parameters:
        memberName - - member name
        parentMemberId - - id of parent member under which to search if any of its chidren, sub-children have a given member name
        Returns:
        - boolean result - if there is a member in the member hierarchy under given parent member with given name

      • changeChildMemberActivationStatusByParentMemberId

        void changeChildMemberActivationStatusByParentMemberId(Long parentMemberId,
                                                     MemberStatusType status)
                                                       throws Exception
        Change Activation status for all children, sub-children members under given parent member with new status
        Parameters:
        parentMemberId - - a parent member id under which all its children and sub-children will be changed their status
        status - - MemberStatusType for all sub-children and children under given parent member
        Throws:
        Exception - - throws exception if it fails to change status of all its children and sub-children for given parent member

      • findActiveMembersByCategoryAndParentMember

        Set<Member> findActiveMembersByCategoryAndParentMember(Long categoryId,
                                                     Long parentMemberId)
        Get all members of a given category type and which are under given parent member in its hierarchy tree and which are currently having MemberStatusType as Active
        Parameters:
        categoryId - - id of a category which is a parent category for members to be retrieved
        parentMemberId - - a parent member whose children and sub-children to be searched for given parent category type
        Returns:
        - set of member which have given category as their parent category and which are under given parent member
